title: Samsung partners w/ iFixit to make DIY Galaxy smartphone and tablet repairs a bit easier
content:
As the Right to Repair movement spurs change in the industry, Samsung is today announcing a new partnership with iFixit to make DIY repairs a bit easier for some of its Galaxy phones and tablets.

moreâ€¦

The post Samsung partners w/ iFixit to make DIY Galaxy smartphone and tablet repairs a bit easier appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: With official parts and step-by-step instructions, Samsung and iFixit will make it much easier to repair your Galaxy smartphone yourself.
